src:
Sutra Skupština Narodne stranke, na dnevnom redu izbor stranačkih organa i programski akti

02 Nov 2019, 15:10

 U Beogradu će sutra biti održana Skupština Narodne stranke na kojoj će biti izabrani stranački organi i usvojena četiri nova programska dokumenta o ekonomiji, poljoprivredi, dijaspori i kulturi. Kako je najavljeno iz te partije, u delu skupštinskog zasedanja otvorenom za javnost govoriće predsednik Narodne stranke Vuk Jeremić, potpredsednici Sanda Rašković Ivić, Zdravko Ponoš, Nikola Jovanović, Siniša Kovačević i Miroslav Aleksić, poverenik za Vojvodinu Borislav Novaković i poverenica za Brus Marija Lukić.Skupština Narodne stranke počeće u 11 časova u centru Sava.
text:
Tomorrow the Assembly of the People's Party, the election of party bodies and program acts

02 Nov 2019, 15:10

The National People's Party Assembly will be held in Belgrade tomorrow, with party organs elected and four new programming documents on economy, agriculture, diaspora and culture adopted. As announced from the party, Speaker of the People's Party Vuk Jeremic, Vice-Presidents Sanda Raskovic Ivic, Zdravko Ponos, Nikola Jovanovic, Sinisa Kovacevic and Miroslav Aleksic, Vojvodina Commissioner Borislav Novakovic and Bruce Commissioner Marija Lukic will speak in the open session. The People's Party Assembly will start at 11am in the Sava Center.
